altername_name: Shin Samurai Spirits: Haoumaru Jigoku Hen
Shin Samurai Spirits: Haoumaru Jigokuhen: Samurai Shodown II
name: Samurai Shodown II
overview: They've licked their wound, improved their techniques, and now they're back! The world's 15 fiercest warriors clang steel in a fast and furious fest of fencing festivities. Use new characters and new feints of Fury to hack, slice, dice and Julien fry your way to victory.
